show_name: Croisée in a Foreign Labyrinth - The Animation (TV)
other_title: La croisée dans un labyrinthe étranger (French)
異国迷路のクロワーゼ (Japanese)
plot: In the 19th century, a small Japanese girl named Yune arrives at Paris. She has traveled to France with Oscar Claudel to work at his shop, Enseignes du Roy. There she meets his grandson, Claude Claudel, a blacksmith who makes street signs for stores. Caught in a whole new cultural experience, both Yune and Claude learn a lot from each other while they try to keep the shop open despite the declining number of customers at the Galerie du Roy. Once a popular marketplace, many nearby businesses are closing as they are all engulfed by the waves of change.
opening_theme: "Sekai wa Odoru yo, Kimi to" (世界は踊るよ、君と) by Youmou to Ohana
"Sekai wa Odoru yo, Kimi to" (Acoustic version) by Youmou to Ohana
ending_theme: "Koko kara Hajimaru Monogatari" (ここから始まる物語) by Nao Tōyama
"Tooku Kimi e" (遠く君へ) by Megumi Nakajima
insert_song: "Miwatase ba" (見渡せば) by Nao Tōyama
"Sai ta Sakura" (咲いたさくら) by Nao Tōyama
"Takara mono" (たからもの) by Mamiko Noto and Nao Tōyama
